legacy_button_description.LegacyDummyButton: A dummy button that has no function.
legacy_button_description.LegacyCallTalkingButton: It lights red when the user is in a talking call (not holding/ringing)
legacy_button_description.LegacyNoAnswerButton: To automatically reject incoming calls. It lights red when enabled
legacy_button_description.LegacyCallbackButton: It blinks red if a callback is available. It lights red when the callback is active (this function is under construction)
legacy_button_description.LegacyToggleRecordingButton: To start/stop call recording. It lights red if started
legacy_button_description.LegacyPrevCallButton: To switch to the previous call. It blinks red if there's a previous call
legacy_button_description.LegacyMonitorDialingExtensionButton: To monitor the dialing extension (this function is under construction)
legacy_button_description.LegacyToggleMutedButton: To mute/unmute your sound input device on the current call. It lights red if muted
legacy_button_description.LegacyNextCallButton: To switch to the next call. It blinks red if there's a next call
legacy_button_description.LegacyLineButton: To monitor status of a given line number. It blinks red when there's incoming call on the line, you can press the button to answer the call. It lights red when there's a talking call on the line.
legacy_button_description.LegacyKeypadButton: To dial a given symbol to make a call or to be sent as DTMF if there's a current call
legacy_button_description.LegacyMakeCallButton: To make a call to the dialing number
legacy_button_description.LegacyBackspaceButton: To delete the last dialing number
legacy_button_description.LegacyIncomingCallButton: It lights red when the current call is incoming
legacy_button_description.LegacyThreeWayCallButton: To start three-way call (this function is under construction)
legacy_button_description.LegacyOutgoingCallButton: It lights red when the current call is outging
legacy_button_description.LegacyHangUpCallButton: To hang up the current call
legacy_button_description.LegacyPickUpCallButton: To pick up the current call
legacy_button_description.LegacyQuickCallButton: To call a shortening dial number
legacy_button_description.LegacyAutoDialButton: To show/hide a auto dial view

widget_description.LegacyButton: This widget shows a button that you can assign a preset function to it.
widget_description.LegacyCallPanel: This widget shows the current call information and the dialing number
widget_description.LegacyExtensionStatus: This widget shows the status of a given extension number. It lights red if the extension is on a talking call. It lights yellow if the extension is on a holding/ringing call.
widget_description.Text: This widget shows a given text.
widget_description.CallTable: This widget shows a table of active calls.
widget_description.ExtensionTable: This widget shows a table of extensions.
widget_description.Note: This widget shows a sticky note.
widget_description.LineTable: This widget shows a table of lines.
widget_description.LegacyUccacWidget: This widget shows a UC Chat Agent Component.
